attributes.action: Allow regretful Leave voters the choice to revoke/change their vote, if desired
attributes.background: I feel that the Public were strongly misled by Brexit Campaigners and reserve the right to revoke/change their decision. I voted purely on conjecture and propaganda fed to us by parts of the media & Brexit, and given the opportunity would rescind my vote in favour to Remain within the EU.

rejection.details:
If you would like there to be a second referendum, you could sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/133753
